title: (im 14 shy of a skin and i have no idea what Discussion board to put this in, so the story is here)
body:
I was down at the arcade yesterday playing some games and a girl with fox ears showed up, she asked me what i was doing then after that i don't remember much, i didn't think anything of it but when i went back into the store to play some games i found out i didn't have enough coins to play! I'm guessing the girl took it from me when i was _charmed_, someone help me! i need the 14 more coins**(RP)** to play the games at the arcade,(_Looking to buy Arcade Ahri_) I'm so close to beating the high scores of 'Blitzcrank's Poro Roundup' If anyone has any leads on this criminal tell me or the officers up in Piltover and bring her to justice!
She looked Ionian, and as i said earlier she had fox ears and for whatever reason purple hair. Send all information about this evil doer to Vi and Caitlyn and to me so we can put an end to this foxy character.

_I'm not sure if y'all still top off people who need very little RP, but if you still do it would be very appreciated, thanks for making my favorite game and have a good day :D_

replies.body:
ShinyGalvantula,

This is Lieutenant Graves. Thank you for bringing this matter to my attention. I've spoken with Officer Vi and Caitlyn and they've informed me that they've rounded up some suspects. They require a [written statement to our support staff](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can finish taking care of this matter and put this outrageous criminal behind bars once and for all!

If you have any questions, please let me know, but *please* act with **haste**.
We are all good on this front, thanks for notifying the authorities! I'm ready to smash that record and have some fun gaming!
Again sorry if this is in the wrong spot i didn't really know where to put this, so yeah...i feel like its in the wrong spot...too late now, this is awkward :|
